body:
Hi jr mods, mods and others!

I got warned for 6 times. I was in hub. Didnt do anything but i got warned.

Please, give me quick explanation.


I want explanation from jozz, sunaye and festival. I'm not angry just tell me why
body_tagged:
Hi jr mods, mods and others!

I got warned for 6 times. I was in hub. Didnt do anything but i got warned.

Please, give me quick explanation.


I want explanation from jozz, sunaye and festival. I'm not angry just tell me why
title: Got warned 6 times

replies.body:
Hey Tom.
This is a bug where your past infractions repeat themselves. They haven't been recorded on your profile.
You've only had three warns on your infraction page.

Don't worry too much about this.
:)
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Tom.
This is a bug where your past infractions repeat themselves. They haven't been recorded on your profile.
You've only had three warns on your infraction page.

Don't worry too much about this.
:)

replies.body: So actually i didnt get warned
replies.body_tagged: So actually i didnt get warned

replies.body:
Correct.
Your 3 and only 3 infractions are warns which is what appeared in game, what's in your screenshot wasn't actually dealt to you at the moment in time.
replies.body_tagged:

reply_to.body: So actually i didnt get warned
reply_to.body_tagged: So actually i didnt get warned

replies.body:
It's just a glitch, and yeah, you weren't actually warned. You won't get new infractions from this.



Edit: ninja'd by Jack.

replies.body: I was worrying cuz i applied for mod. Thank you for fast answer
